title: [1.8][ssp/smp]Xaero's Special Attacks——奇特的武器[6月13号新机制升级！]
author: shuaohao38
txt_content:
本帖最后由 shuaohao38 于 2015-6-13 20:00 编辑 

经常搬运插件的我这次来搬运Mod了
之前搬运了一个结果给人抢了。。。
希望这次没人抢

不起眼的原文：This mod is Copyright ?xaero96 and is the intellectual property of the author. It may be not be reproduced under any circumstances except for personal, private use as long as it remains in its unaltered, unedited form. It may not be placed on any web site or otherwise distributed publicly without advance written permission. Use of this mod on any other website or as a part of any public display is strictly prohibited, and a violation of copyright. 

Special Attacks mod is inspired by an MMORPG "RuneScape". 
The mod makes it possible for you to charge your weapons and perform their special attacks. Special attacks will require special energy which can be restored in multiple ways. The mod is fully multiplayer compatible and can be great for PVP. 

The mod description is about the 2.0+ (MC 1.8) version of the mod. For MC 1.6.4 info click here.
What does the mod add?Ability to charge any vanilla Minecraft weapons to give them special attacks.Specials attacks/effects for all charged weapons.Special energy bar above your hunger bar whenever there is a charged weapon in your hotbar.2 categories of special attacks: special attacks and special effects.
Important information:To charge a weapon, simply surround it with 4 Crystals of Energy in a pattern shown in the image below. Please note that the weapon has to be completely unused.Charged weapons will also have increased durability. 100 more uses than the normal ones.To activate or disactivate a special attack press R and the next time you hit a target a special attack will execute. When activated, if you have enough energy the name of the special attack will go green, if not - yellow.Special effects will execute as soon as you press R. All special attacks/effects require special energy which can be restored by drinking Energy Potions.Energy Potions can be made by smelting Crystals of Energy and then combining Liquid Energy, which you get from smelting, with Glass Bottles. Crystals of Energy spawn exactly like diamonds but in bigger stacks.Your energy also regenerates at a rate of 5% every 15 seconds. This effect can be boosted with a Helmet Of Energy.Scroll down for crafting recipes and a list of all special attacks!
Items:Crystal of Energy - Used to charge your weapons. Obtained from mining Energy Ore.Liquid Energy - Obtained from smelting crystals of energy. Used to make potions of energy.Potion of Energy - Can be made by combining liquid energy with normal glass bottles. When used, restores 50%of your special energy. You might need a lot of these.Helmet of Energy - As good as a diamond helm but makes you regenerate energy 2x faster. Requires 5 iron ingots, 2 crystals of energy and 2 diamonds.
Blocks:Energy Ore - Looks similar to gold but glows slightly in the dark. Gives you crystals of energy when mined. Can be mined with any pickaxe.


Special attacks:Leech Food (wooden axe) - Restores hunger by 2.0 when hitting mobs or players. Target player also loses 2.0 of their hunger. Uses 15% of your energy bar.Soulsplit (golden axe) - Restores health by 2.0 hearts when hitting mobs or players. Uses 15% of your energy bar.Leech energy (stone axe) - 50% chance of restoring energy by 30% (45% if you count the used energy) when hitting mobs or players. Target player also loses 15% of their energy bar. Requires 15% of your energy bar.Thunder (iron axe) - Hits your target with a lightning bolt. Uses 45% of your energy bar.Vengeance (diamond axe) - Hits additional damage, which is 2 times your missing health. The less health you have the higher you will hit. Uses 45% of your energy bar.Shotgun (bow) - shoots up to 9 arrows at once when the bow is fully pulled and special attack is active.Uses 5% of your energy bar.Creeper blast (diamond sword) - Invisibility for 2 seconds. Launches you 5 blocks in the air and creates a huge explosion, which absolutely destroys everything on it's path. Uses 55% of your energy bar.
Special effects (execute instantly):Hunger restore (wooden sword) - Saturation III for 15 seconds. Uses 100% of your energy.Rapid heal (golden sword) - Regeneration III, Resistance II, Fire Resistance, Water Breathing for 15 seconds. Uses 50% of your energy.Ninja escape (stone sword) - Creates a "zombie clone" of your character, then gives you Resistance II for 3 seconds, Invisibility for 2 seconds and launches you 18 blocks in the air, which combined with invisibility should look pretty sweet. Uses 50% of your energy.Animal Instincts (iron sword) - Night Vision, Speed, Strength III for 10 seconds. Uses 60% of your energy.
Install guide for 1.8 / 1.6.4:You can get forge here: http://files.minecraftforge.netDownload and run the latest or the recommended(if such exists) installer for the needed version. This should create a new or replace the old "Forge" profile in your Minecraft client.Download the mod by clicking the golden "Download Mod" button. Choose the appropriate mod version and download it.Go to "C:/Users/YOUR USER/AppData/Roaming/.minecraft/mods" or to an equivalent on other OS' and put the jar file you've just downloaded there.Start your minecraft client and log in using the "Forge" profile.If you are still having problems getting this mod to work, contact me via PM.Have fun

All reviews are outdated. Waiting for new.



Progress:55% CompleteGame Version:Minecraft 1.8Tags:Pvp, Runescape, Special, Attacks, Specs, Bar, Ability, Abilities, Ore, Crystal, Ingot, Potion, Food, Liquid, Better, Awesome, Best, Cool, Top, New ContentCredit:jagex, wynncraft


Update #18 - 2.0.1 (MC 1.8) : 03/02/2015 9:24:28 am3/02/15* Improved keybinds system.
* Bug fixes.




Update #17 - 2.0 (MC 1.8) : 02/23/2015 5:05:17 am2/23/15+ New energy ore texture
* Reworked special attacks mechanics from scratch. 
Instead of left-right-left, specs can now be activated with a configurable keybind that is R by default. 
Names of the specs are now displayed in 4 colours:
Green - attack activated and you have enough energy.
Yellow - activated but not enough energy. 
White - enough energy but not activated. 
Red - not activated and not enough energy.

There are now 2 types of special attacks: special attacks and special effects. While special attacks only execute when hitting a target, special effects activate instantly when pressing the bind key. It is also possible for me to add both attack and effects for a single weapon. All the special attacks and effects are listed in the mod description.
* Rebalanced usage of energy.
* Passive special attacks are now active with a 100% chance of execution.
* Buffs/nerfs for specs, previously known as passive, for rebalancing purposes.
* Energy bar will now be visible in creative mode. However, you only lose energy in survival.
* Bug fixes.




Update #16 - 1.1.4 : 02/07/2015 10:32:50 am2/07/15* Added 2 second resistance II effect to the diamond sword spec to prevent fall damage.
* Fixed energy restoration.
* Your zombie clone from stone sword spec will now attack all hostile mobs and players except you.
* Fixed controls menu crash.
* Fixed stone sword spec crash.
* Slightly changed energy ore texture.
- Removed damage to blocks with diamond sword spec.




Update #15 - 1.1.3 Beta (for Minecraft 1.8) : 01/15/2015 8:07:41 am1/15/15* Fixed crash on load when not using Better PvP Mod.




Update #14 - 1.1.2 Beta (for Minecraft 1.8) : 12/27/2014 10:48:16 am12/27/14* All 1.1.1 changes
* Fixed energy not restoring




Update #13 - 1.1.1 Beta (for Minecraft 1.8) : 12/27/2014 10:12:16 am12/27/14* Energy bar will now be visible if you have a charged weapon anywhere in your action bar.
* Ninja escape (stone sword) will now create a zombie clone of yourself.
* Charged bow will now have a passive special attack instead of active. You will no longer have to activate it through left-right-left combination. It will fire up to 9 arrows every time it's fully pulled and will always now use 10% of your energy bar.
* Charged bow will now shoot arrows in a randomized pattern.




Update #12 - 1.1 Beta (for Minecraft 1.8) : 12/24/2014 8:05:47 am12/24/14WARNING: Current version of minecraft forge is in beta. Use it at your own risk. 
* Upgraded to 1.8 Minecraft
* Special energy bar will now only be visible when holding a charged weapon (might change)
* New energy ore texture




Update #11 - 5,000 downloads : 01/13/2014 9:03:12 am1/13/14We've just reached 5,000 downloads! Wohoo!

Update #6 - v1.0.4 : 12/18/2013 7:03:56 am12/18/13Changed the texture of energy crystalsChanged the texture of liquid energyMinor bug fixes





Update #5 - 2,000 downloads & Thanks Jason! : 12/16/2013 7:22:58 am12/16/13We've just reached 2,000 downloads!
Also,
Thank you so much, MinecraftUniverse, for making a mod review!




Update #4 - v1.0.3 : 12/14/2013 10:28:32 am12/14/13Added a helmet of energy, which when worn makes you regen energy twice as fast.Fixed a bug with charged bow.





Update #3 - v1.0.2.1(A tiny update) : 12/11/2013 1:14:35 pm12/11/13Changed the texture of energy potions.





Update #2 - v1.0.2 : 12/09/2013 10:03:28 am12/09/13Updated energy bar textureAdded charged weapons - can do special attacks and have 100 more usesMoved special attacks from normal weapons to charged weapons.

Also moved the main video down because it's now outdated.
BTW, let me know in the comments what you think about adding charged armors in the next update?




Update #1 - v1.0.1 : 12/07/2013 12:06:29 pm12/07/13Changed textures for energy crystals, liquid and ore.Added passive special attacks for all axes.Removed left-right-left message.Made special attack names turn red if they can't be performed at the moment.










增加内容： - 增加能量水晶（不知道为什么名字变成了item.energy.name） - 增加液体能源 - 增加能量药水 - 增加能量头盔 - 增加能量弓、能量（各种）剑、能量（各种）斧
特效：喝了能量药水之后会有一条能量条




QQ图片20150213121144.png (2.83 KB, 下载次数: 604)

下载附件

2015-2-13 12:23 上传




能量每15秒回复5%要想使用这个能量条就要拿着武器按热键（默认R键），不同武器有不同的效果武器效果如下：饥饿回复（能量木剑）：饱和三15秒-使用你100%的能量。快速治疗（能量金剑）：生命恢复三、抗性提升二、防火、水下呼吸各15秒-使用你50%的能量。忍者躲避（能量石剑）：召唤一只你的替身（名字和你一样、带着和你一样装备的僵尸）然后将你升到离地面18格的空中、获得抗性提升二3秒、隐身2秒-使用你50%的能量。变身狼人（能量铁剑）：夜视、速度、力量三各十秒、并在使用时发出狼叫-使用你60%的能量。苦力怕式躲避（能量钻石剑）：产生爆炸并将你弹到空中5格高的地方，获得隐身、抗性提升两秒-使用你60%的能量。霰弹枪（能量弓）：最多一次性射出9把剑，主要取决于你背包里还有几把箭和你还有多少能量-每把箭使用5%的能量。回复加速（能量头盔）：让你的能量回复速度x2。迅雷雷电（能量铁斧）：在攻击你的目标时放电产生雷电-使用你15%的能量。复仇（能量钻石斧）：你的血量越低攻击力越高，最后一下会产生假的爆炸-每下使用你15%的能量。水蛭能量（能量石斧）：有50%的可能给你回复30%的能量，同时如果你攻击的目标是玩家，则目标损失15%的能量-需要15%的能量。精神分裂（能量金斧）：当你攻击生物时你会回复2点生命值-消耗15%的能量。水蛭之食（能量木斧）：当你攻击生物时你会回复2点饱食度，同时如果你攻击的目标是玩家，则目标损2点饱食度-消耗15%的能量。合成表：

矿石名字叫能量矿石反正都是能量什么的啦_(:зゝ∠)_籽岷的介绍视频登场~：此Mod介绍时间为16:51，大家可以跳过去观看http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XODkyNTU0NzUy.html
更新日志：
2.0：
-增加新的能源矿石的材质
*重做特殊武器的机制：
   -不再是左右左发动特殊技能而是使用R键发动。
   -名字的规格会有四种颜色：
      绿色-武器已激活且你的能量充足
      黄色-武器已激活但是你的能量不足
      白色-能量充足但是武器未激活
      红色-武器未激活且能量不足
-重新调整了能量的使用
-被动效果现在都是100%触发（前提是按了R键来激活武器）
-效果/nerf（求翻译）以前是被定义为被动效果，现在重新调整了其定义
-能量条在创造模式中也可见
-修复bugs

特殊攻击的方式有两种：特殊攻击和特殊效果。就算效果只会在攻击目标之后才会出现，但也会且必须通过按热键（默认R键）来激活武器。

2.0.1：
-升级热键系统
-修复bugs

此MOD只完成55%，接下来还会有很多的重大更新，请大家继续关注
最后就是下载地址：

shuaohao38 发表于 2015-2-11 19:06
哎
现在的人呐
总是那么爱找茬
连武器攻击力都不给，硬是让别人自己下载来体验。我不认为我是在找茬
这么简略的搬运反倒是让人诟病的，搬运是要求自己测试的。即使你是抢先搬运也是，声明详细数据会在之后发出。如果这是你的搬运水平，那么我要质疑你的搬运工徽章了，这到底哪里优秀了？随便贴张合成，连一点东西都不贴就是优秀了？
一句很屌的武器就能解释这个MOD，你让作者花心思做的东西脸面何在？
先不提搬运许可的问题，这个类似随便搬完就走的态度就很有问题。
如果你还觉得你自己这个搬运没有任何问题的话，请允许我对你的搬运经历提出怀疑
